scene_description_enriched: An elderly man with a long white beard and a halo is seated on an ornate chair, dressed in a blue robe with gold trim. He is holding a quill and appears to be writing or transcribing from an open book placed on a triangular lectern. The book has illuminated text. The background consists of green drapery and architectural elements suggesting an interior space. The chair has a carved face on its armrest.
